title: mongo备份数据
text: crontab -l 123返回：1 */4 * * * /data/backdb/back_up.sh >/dev/null >&2 cat /data/backdb/back_up.sh 12345678910111213141516## declare an array variabledeclare -a db_arr=( "securitybug" "securitybugv2" "umanager" )db_bk=/data/backdb/backup## now loop through the above arrayfor i in "${db_arr[@]}"do echo "start to dump " $i mongodump -h 172.28.196.75:20000 -d $i -o $db_bk echo "end" # or do whatever with individual element of the arraydone 12345chmod +x ./backup.shcrontab -lcrontab -e40 22 * * * /data/lpf/test/backup.sh //每天22点40执行脚本

title: mysql备份数据
text: mysql数据库备份backup.sh 1234567891011#!/bin/shdb_arr=( "web")for i in "${db_arr[@]}"do echo "start to dump" $i docker exec -it docker-mysql[docker_container_id/docker_name] mysqldump -h 120.132.26.176 -uroot -p[password] --databases web > /data/backdb/`date "+%Y%m%d"`web.sql echo "end to dump ${db_arr[$i]}"done 12345chmod +x ./backup.shcrontab -lcrontab -e40 22 * * * /data/lpf/test/backup.sh //每天22点40执行脚本
